=MIDI controllers=

==Parameter controllers==
This are the default MIDI controllers, you should use the base channel
10 and 11 to send the controllers in this table.<BR>
In addition repulse receives the pitch wheel controller.<br>

==Additional controllers==
You can tune the omni and local parameters via the GUI or MIDI, and the base channel and base note parameters via the GUI. This helps matching repulse to your hardware.<br>
You can make the pitch bend paramenter (the wheel controller) control the repulse
global pitch or the global length of the samples.
